Package Camelot :: Package camelot :: Package admin :: Package validator :: Module object_validator :: Class ObjectValidator
[frames] | no frames]

Class ObjectValidator

source code

A validator class for normal python objects. By default this validator declares all objects valid. Subclass this class and overwrite it's objectValidity method to change it's behaviour.
Instance Methods

since this might take a lot of time on large collections.		 source code
